data.message:
Rap God: A History Of Eminem’s Biggest Achievements::

★ Eminem is first artist since 1964 to have four songs in the top 20 of Billboard's Hot 100 as a lead artist.

★ Second best-selling solo male artist of the SoundScan era

★ First hip-hop artist to win an Academy Award (Oscar)

★ Best selling artist of the 2000s

★ First artist to win Best Rap Album for three consecutive LPs

★ First hip-hop artist to win MTV Europe Music Global Icon Award

★ First artist in Nielsen SoundScan history to have two year-end best-selling albums

★ Fastest selling album in hip-hop history

★ First artist ever to receive two RIAA Digital Single Diamond Awards

★ Only rapper to have two diamond album.

★ Best selling hip-hop artist of all time

Yes...but how many rappers are there all over the world?....& who was giving Eminem all the push & pull?....If this what we read is all true....how come MJ cd's outsold every artist when he died?...Eminem's cd's I've still seen sitting I the shops & no one buying them....So how many really like em?....& how many fakes & hanger on's are there?....Eminem is good enough..but there are lots out there who are just as good or maybe better which is all in what one likes
